sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup"; import * as yup from "yup"; import "./CatAdd.scss"; const origin = "http://localhost:9001"; const schema = yup.object().shape({ name: yup.string().required("Name is required please"), age: yup.number().positive().integer().required("Age is required please"), gender: yup.string().required("Gender is required please"), health: yup.string().required("Health situation is required please"), personality: yup.string().required("Personality is required please"), email: yup.string().email().required("Email is required please"), breed: yup.string().required("Breed is required please"), city: yup.string().required("City is required please"), }); function CatAdd() { const [data, setData] = useState({ name: "", age: "", gender: "", health: "", personality: "", email: "", breed: "", city: "", }); const beforeSubmit = (e) => {}; const inputHandler = (e) => { const newData = { ...data }; newData[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setData(newData); }; const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post(`${origin}/cats`, { name: data.name, age: data.age, gender: data.gender, health: data.health, personality: data.personality, email: data.email, breed: data.breed, city: data.city, }) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); }); }; return (
); } export default CatAdd;
